content: sunny the sunflower turtle pattern created by talk nerdy crochet you may sell items made using this pattern but please credit me as the creator and do not sell the pattern this pattern uses us crochet terms materials 3 5mm crochet hook 8mm safety eyes double knit yarn in brown yellow and turquoise stuffing yarn needle abbreviations single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet treble_crochet - treble_crochet increase - increase decrease - decrease blo - back loops only head in turquoise round 1 6sc into a magic_ring 6 round 2 increase in every stitch 12 round 3 sc1 increase repeat to end of round 18 round 4 sc2 increase repeat to end of round 24 round 5-7 single_crochet around 24 round 8 sc2 decrease repeat to end of round 18 begin stuffing round 9 sc1 decrease repeat to end of round 12 round 10 decrease around 6 fasten_off and weave in your ends add safety eyes between rounds 4 and 5 fins make 4 in turquoise round 1 8sc into a magic_ring 8 round 2 increase in every stitch 16 round 3 sc1 increase repeat to end of round 24 round 4 single_crochet around 24 fold the circle in half and crochet along the curved edge to the then side fo and leave a long tail for sewing shell in brown round 1 6sc into a magic_ring 6 round 2 increase in every stitch 12 round 3 sc1 increase repeat to end of round 18 round 4 sc2 increase repeat to end of round 24 round 5 sc3 increase repeat to end of round 30 round 6 sc2 increase sc2 repeat to end of round 36 round 7 single_crochet in the blo fasten_off and switch back to turquoise round 8 single_crochet around 36 round 9 sc4 decrease repeat to end of round 30 round 10 sc3 decrease repeat to end of round 24 round 11 sc2 decrease repeat to end of round 18 begin stuffing cut a long tail and begin sewing the base of the shell closed stuffing as you do this will help keep it flat once you have stuffed the shell enough fully close the hole and fasten_off weaving in your ends petals in yellow attach yarn using a slip_stitch in the remaining loops of the blo round to create the petals double_crochet treble_crochet double_crochet all in the same stitch single_crochet to the next stitch and repeat all the way round until the end assembly pin the fins to the base of the shell so the flat side of the fin is facing the center of the turtle and the curved side is facing outwards leaving enough space for the head pin the head in place making sure everything looks even cut a long piece of turquoise yarn and sew the head onto the body i hope you enjoyed this pattern and i d love to see your
